alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 8:26AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN GULF AND SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 930 AM EST/830 AM CST/... At 826 AM EST/726 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Mexico Beach, or 14 miles west of Port St. Joe, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Nine Mile, Highland View, Eleven Mile, St Joseph State Park, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Tilton, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, Milltown, and Simmons Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf
